text: Ignaz Puschnik (5 February 1934 - 17 December 2020) was an Austrian football midfielder. He played for Austria from 1957 to 1964 and during the 1958 FIFA World Cup.Copa do Mundo da FIFA Su√©cia 1958 He also played for Kapfenberger SV from 1956 to 1964. Puschnik was born in Vienna. ==Career== Puschnik spent his entire senior career at Kapfenberg SV. ==Death== Puschnik died on 17 December 2020 in Vienna at the age of 86.Ignaz Puschnik verstorben ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Austrian footballers Category:Sportspeople from Vienna
title: Ignaz Puschnik
